objectives.en: This seminar will cover advanced topics in the field of informaton systems, both from a management and from an engineering perspectives. Students will engage in active learning by reading academic and industry papers on various topics in the field, presenting these papers to the class, and participating in focused discussions.
objectives.et: Seminaris tutvutakse infosüsteemide süvateemadega, seda nii juhtimises kui ka insenerlikus aspektis. Omandatakse kogemused tööks kirjandusega selles valdkonnas, samuti vastava info presenteerimiseks ja  erialastes diskussioonides rakendamiseks

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students should be able to:
1. Collect, analyze and present information about advanced topics in the field of information systems in a structured manner.
learning_outcomes.et: 1.	Struktureeritult koguda, analüüsida ja esitada infot infosüsteemide süvateemade kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Formulate informed observations and comments about key issues and approaches in the field of information systems.
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	Asjatundlikult formuleerida vaateid ning selgitusi võtmeküsimuste kohta infosüsteemide valdkonnas.

grade_preconditions.et: Students will be assessed based on at least two presentations to be given during the seminar and based on their attendance to the seminars and participation in the class discussions.
